domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: The Office
entity.description: This U.S. adaptation -- set at a paper company based in Scranton, Pa. -- has a similar documentary style to that of the Ricky Gervais-led British original. It features the Dunder-Mifflin staff, which includes characters based on roles in the British show -- and, quite possibly, people with whom you work in your office. There's Jim, the likable employee who's a bit of an every man. Jim has a thing for receptionist-turned-sales-rep Pam -- because office romances are always a good idea! There's also Dwight, the co-worker who is successful but devoid of social skills and common sense.

urls.title: Trinidad & Tobago - Travel Authorisation
urls.description: 1. Non Nationals who are NOT FULLY VACCINATED will NOT be allowed entry into Trinidad and Tobago at this time. 2. Travellers may begin the Application process 72 hours before arrival in Trinidad and Tobago. 3. All Travellers (including minors) must submit a Negative COVID-19 PCR or Lab Acquired Antigen test result (Home Antigen test results will not be accepted). The test should have been taken no earlier than seventy-two (72) hours prior to arrival in Trinidad and Tobago. Proof of this must be presented

urls.title: Trinidad & Tobago - Travel Authorisation
urls.description: 1. Non Nationals who are NOT FULLY VACCINATED will NOT be allowed entry into Trinidad and Tobago at this time. 2. Travellers may begin the Application process 72 hours before arrival in Trinidad and Tobago. 3. All Travellers (including minors) must submit a Negative COVID-19 PCR or Lab Acquired Antigen test result (Home Antigen test results will not be accepted). The test should have been taken no earlier than seventy-two (72) hours prior to arrival in Trinidad and Tobago. Proof of this must be presented

data.text: Remember to be on time! Get to the airport 4 hrs before your flight to give enough time for pandemic protocols, security and check-in process. For flights during curfew hours, ensure you have necessary documentation for transportation to/from airport #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/6bZvS0aX2x

Happy #NationalAviationDay! ✈️
Hats off to all our amazing teams who continue to soar high above the rest! We appreciate you for making our airline the Caribbean’s favourite and ensuring our passengers’ safety and comfort on each and every flight!
#iamcaribbean #iflycaribbean https://t.co/0TPpt6N0vI

data.text: RT @MCO: We are celebrating today, calypso style, the return of @iflycaribbean at MCO! The airline resumes service to/from Port of Spain, T…

Welcome back Orlando!
Happy to serve you once more! ✈️
Caribbean Airlines welcomed the restart of twice weekly flights between Trinidad and Orlando on August 16, 2021.
#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/9DvAWYbWkW

@Rod20200 @Rod20200 requirements are dependent on the destination. To be up to date with entry requirements for your destination check here : https://t.co/IuM92MWvdR 

-

Fly Guyana to Orlando -  $540 USD  (incl. taxes)

*conditions apply
